description:
Do you enjoy finding out interesting, bizarre or quirky facts? Whether you want something easy or more challenging, Trivia DLC will unlock many more hours of gameplay for you!

Features:
-Over 1200 new trivia questions in Tournament and Quick Play mode!
-Questions divided into 3 difficulty modes, ranging from almost obvious to completely obscure!
-Various categories â€“ animals, people, food, cities, nature wonders, mountains, bodies of water and famous buildings.
name: Planet Quiz: Trivia DLC
